titleInfo.title: Child Care: The States' Response: A Survey of State Child Care Policies 1983-1984

location.physicalLocation: Langston Hughes Library (Children's Defense Fund Haley Farm)

mods.abstract: CDF surveyed every state in the country in 1983 to gather information on the nature, quality, and extent of child care serv ices being offered under Title XX of the Social Security Act, the Social Services Block Grant. Title XX is the major source of direct federal funding for child care. CDF published the findings in a study entitled Children and Federal Child Care Cuts: A National Survey of the Impact of Federal Title XX Cuts on State Child Care Systemin Sept. 1983. Since that time, we conducted a second study and updated the findings. This report represents the results of that survey and an agenda that must be implemented if we are to meet the needs of our children and families.
